description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Swamp Defense is a classic tower defense game for any beginners or defensive specialist. Fight your way through a large number of levels with different routes. Unique tower types help you to defeat the Swamp Monsters.  Features: 5 different Towers (the family) , 8 types of enemies,  15 unique Levels with interesting routes,  Endless waves (if you are good enough ;) ) unlockable levels
